name: Simply secure chat client
body:
This project is meant for educational purposes.  It is completely free to use, modify, and redistribute as long as this readme file remains intact.

Project information:
	Title:  Simply Secure Chat Client
	Developer:  Nicholas Rog√©
	Purpose:
		This project is meant to provide those who need it with a one-time use chat client that will enable two people to remotely connect and communicate with each other with a secure connection.
tagline: An attempt at making a secure chat client.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
